short_summary: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. This is the 5th Request for Information (RFI) pertaining to the DEFENCEX project.
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. This is the 5th Request for Information (RFI) pertaining to the DEFENCEX project.
full_summary:
# Request for Information (RFI) - DefenceX Project

**Reference Number:** WS3189418126-DOC4308617024

**Publication Date:** November 14, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** November 20, 2023, at 14:00 EST

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing the 5th Request for Information (RFI) for the DefenceX project, a cutting-edge information technology (IT) consultation project. 

**Project Information:**
The DefenceX project aims to modernize the Department of National Defence's (DND) IT systems, enhancing cybersecurity and supporting the integration of new technologies.

**Key Requirements:**
* The project requires IT consultation services to analyze and improve the DND's IT systems.
* The successful contractor will provide IT management services to support the integration of new technologies.
* Computer services will also be required to support the project's objectives.

**Trade Agreements:**
The DefenceX project is open to bidders from countries that have signed trade agreements with Canada, including the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, and the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP).

**Contracting Details:**
The contracting entity for the DefenceX project is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC). The project's end-user entity is the Department of National Defence (DND).

**Procurement Method:**
This is a competitive tender, open to all qualified bidders. The selection criteria are based on the bidder's ability to meet the project's requirements.

**Contact Information:**
For any questions or inquiries, please contact Emily Gordon, PSPC, at emily.gordon@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Notice URL:**
The RFI can be accessed through Ariba Discovery at the following URL: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18006839?extsite=MTgwMDY4MzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

Note: The RFI will expire on November 20, 2023, at 14:00 EST. No extensions will be granted.

**Attachments:**
No attachments are available for this RFI.

Best regards,  
[Your Name]
